p: Step C': Dissolve potassium tert-butoxide (13.097 kg, 117.29 mol, 2.75 eq) in THF in a 100-L vessel. Add a mixture of ethyl propionate (12.2 L, 106.63 mol, 2.5 eq) and acetonitrile (6.68 L) over 45 min at an internal temperature of 18 to 21 °C and stir for 1 h at this temperature to provide the corresponding potassium enolate.
